message.body: You coming tomorrow? Driving separate or need a ride?
Just getting off highway flat tire get back to you in sec

2nd flat tire in a week. Bad karma or something?? Anyway I can't get it fixed until Tuesday probably but I'm probably going to hang around here. Just need a simple weekend I think. Sorry dude. I'm going to sleep this funk off. Have a good night.
You sure? You could ride with us :(
